channel.title: Astronomy on viz.
channel.description: Recent content in Astronomy on viz.

item.title: Kepler's Peas
item.description: The SETI Institute never stop producing beautiful vistas into space. Following them on twitter [@SETIInstitute](https://twitter.com/SETIInstitute) pays off and led me to gems like the Venus images of the Explorer, Images from the Expolanet Travel Beauro (see above) and lately a link to a new paper Peas in a Pod: Planets in a Kepler Multi-planet System are Similar in Size and Regularly Spaced. The authors produced an inticing data viz {{< tweet 666616452582129664 >}}
